Donem servei professional al teu immoble: We offer professional service for your property
Estem emocionats d’oferir-vos un servei: We are excited to offer you a complete and innovative real estate service that includes:
Valoració precisa del teu immoble per ex: Accurate valuation of your property by qualified experts.
Pressupost i Model 3D de la Reforma: Budget and 3D Model of the Renovation
Amb la nostra col·laboració amb una empr: With our collaboration with a highly valued interior design company, we present you with a detailed budget and a 3D model of how your renovated property will look.
Coneix el preu aproximat de la teva prop: Know the approximate price of your property once renovated with the advice of our professionals.
Si no vols invertir personalment en la r: If you do not want to invest personally in the renovation, we connect you with investors interested in financing it.
Completa el formulari següent i ens posa: Complete the following form and we will get in touch with you.
Som en <strong>Jaume Triay</strong> i en: We are Jaume Triay and Dídac Gibert, founders of Gibert & Triay and now partners with a clear goal: to help property owners maximize the potential of their properties. We offer solutions for those who want to personally invest in renovations but don’t know where to start, whom to talk to, or simply lack the time. Additionally, for those who don’t have the resources to finance the renovation or prefer not to invest in it, we offer the option for an investor to cover the renovation costs; in this case, while the investor will earn a profit, the property owner will receive 45% of the net value of the investment. To achieve this, we have established a strategic collaboration with Vibbum, a leading interior design company specializing in comprehensive renovations with a unique and modern style. We also have the support of Propietats.cat, a real estate agency with over 30 years of experience, providing us with the expertise necessary for the appraisal, valuation, and sale of renovated properties.
Si ja vens a través d'una altra immobili: If you are already selling through another real estate agency, the entire sales process, price valuation, and appraisal will be handled with your trusted agent. This way, we can ensure that all our clients receive the best possible service, whether they sell independently or through a real estate agency.
Amb aquesta aliança, oferim una solució: With this partnership, we offer a complete and reliable solution that covers everything from renovation planning to the sale of the property, ensuring a worry-free experience for our clients.
